bonso me tharagawaraye tharaga 16kata sahabhagi wi siti athara maha tharagayedi labu lakunu 97 hondama lakunu wartha kirima wiya.aasiri wikramanayaka lakunu 85k laba ganimata samath wu athara chamika karunarathna ha purna aluthge kadulu 3 bagin binda heluha.me dakwa pawathi maha tharagawaladi rajakiya widuhala wasara 33ka di ha santha thomas widuhala wasara 34ka di jaya wartha kara atha.thedina tharagayak lesa pawathwena paranithama maha tharagaya wana mehi dewani dinaya adayi.santha thomas widuhala palamu inima kadulu 9kata lakunu 325aasiri wikramanayaka 85, jawed bonso 97, chamod pathirana 48, thilaksha sumanasiri 28, dhanushka piris 32 (chamika karunarathna 59/3, purna aluthge 90/3)rajakiya widuhala palamu inima kadulu 1kata lakunu 53isuru gunathilaka nodawi 31, ronaka ahangama 20(dilum pranandu 4/1).
